name: VIDEO: ‘Get Out There’ At The Fair With County Parks & Recreation
description: Get great ideas to get outside this summer at a new San Diego County fair exhibit. This year’s theme at the fair is 'Get Out There', and the County’s Parks and Recreation Department is featured in the main hall. Here’s a sneak peek, and be sure to stop by when you’re at the fair.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: Get great ideas to get outside this summer at a new San Diego County fair exhibit. This year’s theme at the fair is ‘Get Out There’, and the County’s Parks and Recreation Department is featured in the main hall. Here’s a sneak peek, and be sure to stop by when you’re at the fair.
